content: “As followers of Christ, it is our moral responsibility to urge you to support and protect the International Affairs Budget, and avoid disproportionate cuts to these vital programs that ensure that our country continues to be the ‘shining city upon a hill.’” Translation: “As people who pretend to follow Christ we need these drip drips because without the crumbs being shoved around between the people being squashed under our greedy $1,200 pairs of shoes, it makes collection plates look a little too much like Trump China. And that is a hard sell.”
